resource.name: new-account-registration-form
resource.description: Provides the form with which to register a new account.

property.name: given-name
property.description: The first name associated with new account.

property.name: family-name
property.description: The last name associated with new account.

property.name: username
property.description: The username associated with new account. `Username` should be the customer's email address. By default, Cortex API is expecting a customer's email address for their `username`. Your implementation of Cortex API may differ, so check with your system administrator for your `username` rules.

property.name: password
property.description: The password associated with new account.

relationship.name: registration-from-root
relationship.description: Provides the form with which to register a new account.
